title: Museum-Based Health Promotion Experiential Education: Participatory Discussion Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic health literacy and mathematical data interpretation skills
context.additional_context: Project-based learning analyzing health promotion data through mathematical approaches while experiencing virtual museum environments via VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can interpret health data presented in VR-based museum exhibits using mathematical analysis tools (mean, standard deviation, correlation, etc.).
Learners can propose health promotion strategies through mathematical modeling while discussing health-related social issues.
Learners can reinterpret museum exhibit content to create infographics conveying health promotion messages.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
